item.title: Project Euler Problem 9
item.description: Problem 9 - Special Pythagorean triplet (solved by 360,641 as od 8/25/2021) A Pythagorean triplet is a set of three natural numbers, a < b < c, for which, $a^2 + b^2 = c^2$ For example, $3^2 + 4^2 = 9 + 16 = 25 = 5^2$. There exists exactly one Pythagorean triplet for which a + b + c = 1000. Find the product abc. import math def find_special(value=1000): """ Finds the first pythagorean triplet who's sums add to the input value.
